user_query: I am planning a team-building event for my company. Can you provide me with ideas for fun activities, team-building exercises, and venues? Also, suggest some motivational speeches and provide me with the card information for booking the event space.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of fun team-building activities suitable for a corporate event.
Identify and suggest team-building exercises that encourage collaboration and communication among team members.
Provide a list of potential venues for hosting the team-building event, including availability and capacity.
Gather suggestions for motivational speeches or speakers that would fit the theme of the event.
Inquire about venue booking options and payment information necessary for reserving the event space.
